statements: ADVISE SELECT t_1.int_field1, t_1.primary_key_id FROM bucket_01 t_1 INNER JOIN bucket_04 t_4 ON (t_1.primary_key_id = t_4.primary_key_id) INNER JOIN bucket_04 t_5 ON (t_1.primary_key_id = t_5.primary_key_id)

recommending_rule.bucket_04_t_4: Index keys follow order of predicate types: 9. non-static join predicate.
recommending_rule.bucket_04_t_5: Index keys follow order of predicate types: 9. non-static join predicate.

indexes.recommending_rule: Index keys follow order of predicate types: 6. derived join filter as leading key.

results.query: SELECT t_1.int_field1, t_1.primary_key_id FROM bucket_01 t_1 INNER JOIN bucket_04 t_4 ON (t_1.primary_key_id = t_4.primary_key_id) INNER JOIN bucket_04 t_5 ON (t_1.primary_key_id = t_5.primary_key_id);
